thread.title: Up to 40 percent off Halloween costumes at Target with Cartwheel offers, too
thread.title_full: Up to 40 percent off Halloween costumes at Target with Cartwheel offers, too

author: Doreen Christensen
title: Up to 40 percent off Halloween costumes at Target with Cartwheel offers, too
text:
Doreen Christensen Contact Reporter Sun Sentinel Save on Target Inflatable Halloween costumes. 
Save up to 40 percent on Halloween costumes at Target. Plus, stack savings with several Cartwheel offers , too. 
Check out the nifty blow-up options include Homer Simpson ($40), Jaba the Hut ($62,99), Mr. Potato Head ($30), inflatable devil and angel wings ($20) for women and T-Rex Jurassic World ($59.99) and Super Mario ($49.99) for kids, among others. 
You'll likely lose 20 pounds while wearing 'em. Doh! 
Click here for the deal. 
Like Doreen's Deals on Facebook ; follow Doreen Christensen on Twitter@PrettyGoodIdeas and sign up for Deals text alerts .
